UrlApiRest.label: Url api rest
UrlApiRest.helpText: Enter the Url of your api rest

ticket_formato.label: How to use the default zendesk ticket?
ticket_formato.helpText: Select if you want to get the Zendesk ticket in its original format, if you select this option do not complete the other fields below

ticket_id.label: Relational field Ticket ID
ticket_id.helpText: Leave blank if you do not have

ticket_description.label: Relational Field Ticket Description
ticket_description.helpText: Leave blank if you do not have

ticket_status.label: Relacional field Ticket  Status
ticket_status.helpText: Leave blank if you do not have
